newsitem.title: JAPAN: Japan May crude steel output rises 9.5 pct yr/yr.
newsitem.headline: Japan May crude steel output rises 9.5 pct yr/yr.

text.p: Japan's crude steel output rose 9.5 percent in May from a year earlier to 9.22 million tonnes, the Japan Iron and Steel Federation said on Monday.
The May figure was up 4.2 percent from April, the industry group said in a statement.
